nodes.text: A defense minister was present on the Toydarian ministry council during the Clone Wars in 22 BBY.

When the planet Ryloth was invaded by the Separatists, the inhabitants began to suffer. The defense minister was present in the Toydarian Royal Palace alongside King Katuunko and a few other ministers when Alderaanian Senator Bail Organa and Naboo Representative Jar Jar Binks approached them, asking for aid for the suffering Twi'lek on Ryloth. But Neimoidian Senator Lott Dod arrived in a bid to make sure that no relief supply ship is sent to Ryloth. Katuunko then proposed for a debate. After both factions finished their debate, this minister suggested they help the Twi'leks as compassion was a way of the Toydarians.
